about_the_game:
Descend into Madness

You are a private detective, drawn into the heart of a nightmare. A high-security prison, once a symbol of impenetrable justice, is now a macabre tableau of horror. A prisoner has vanished, leaving behind a trail of blood and a haunting silence.

As you delve deeper into this labyrinth of despair, you'll uncover a truth far more sinister than any escape. This isn't just a prison; it's a grotesque experiment gone horribly wrong. The inmates? Subjects of twisted scientific horrors. The escape? A desperate bid for freedom from unimaginable torment.

Features

  • Atmospheric Horror: Immerse yourself in a chilling world of darkness and despair.
  • Intense Exploration: Navigate through a labyrinthine prison filled with horrifying discoveries.
  • Gruesome Puzzles: Unravel the mysteries of the experiments to progress.
    Heart-Pounding Encounters: Face the horrific consequences of human experimentation.
Can you escape the Horror Prison alive?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 2Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 10 capable graphics card with 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended

short_description: Uncover the secrets hidden in the shadows, confront the monstrous results of these experiments, and escape with your sanity intact.
